content: now i don t know why anyone would *want* a hat that doesn t cover their ears and barely stays on their head but my brother wanted one and i couldn t find a pattern so based on the styles he suggested i came up with a simple pattern the pattern is knit in the round from the bottom up a simple 1 x 1 rib makes the brim and then stockinette for the limited length of body and the crown finally the crown decrease create a mild left spin effect
